name: A brainstem map of orofacial rhythms
citation: Li, Nuo (2025) A brainstem map of orofacial rhythms (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001619/draft
description:
Data from "A brainstem map of orofacial rhythms." Heet Kaku, Liu D. Liu, Runbo Gao, Steven West, Song-Mao Liao, Arseny Finkelstein, David Kleinfeld, Alyse Thomas, Sri Laasya Tipparaju, Karel Svoboda, Nuo Li. BioRxiv 2025. doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2025.01.27.635041 

This dataset comprises Neuropixels electrophysiological recordings used to construct a brainstem-wide activity map in behaving mice, DeepLabCut-based tracking of orofacial features, and anatomical localization of recording sites registered to the Allen Mouse Brain Common Coordinate Framework (CCF). 

The corresponding analysis code is available at: https://github.com/NuoLiLabBCM/KakuEtAl2025

Sharing of this dataset was made possible by support from NIH DP1NS142432, R01NS131229, RF1NS132025, Pew Scholar Program, the McKnight Foundation, Simons Collaboration on the Global Brain.
